sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
Suppose that 
\[
	\frac{k }{p } = \frac{l }{q } = \frac{m }{r }
\]
Then show that 
\[
	\frac{k ^3 }{p ^3} + \frac{l ^3 }{q ^3} + \frac{m ^3}{r ^3} = \frac{3klm }{pqr }
\]
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "It is given that 
\[
	\frac{\input[s1v1]{} }{p } = \frac{\input[s1v2]{} }{q } = \frac{m }{r } = s \textrm{ assume}
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow k = ps , l = qs , m = rs 
\]"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
Now, left hand side of the equation can be written as 
\[
	\textrm{LHS } = \frac{k ^3 }{p ^3} + \frac{l ^3 }{q ^3} + \frac{m ^3}{r ^3}
\]
\[
	= \frac{(\input[s2v1]{}s )^3}{p ^3} + \frac{(\input[s2v2]{}s )^3}{q ^3} + \frac{(rs )^3}{r ^3} 
\]"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "\[
	= s ^3 + \input[s3v1]{} ^3 + s ^3 = 3 \input[s3v2]{} ^3
\]"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
Now, right hand side of the equation can be written as
\[
\textrm{RHS } = \frac{3 klm }{pqr }
\]
\[
= \frac{3 (p\input[s4v1]{} )(qs )(rs )}{pqr }
\]
\[
= 3\input[s4v2]{} ^3
\]"}, {"id": "s5", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
From the above two expressions, we can see that
\[
\textrm{LHS } = \textrm{ RHS}
\]
Hence proved.
\newline"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": ["k", "l"], "text": "$$\text{After assumption $\frac{k }{p } = \frac{l }{q} = \frac{m }{r } = s$ and taking terms separately we get $k = ps , l = qs , m = rs$}$$"}, {"data": ["p", "q"], "text": "$$\text{Upon taking LHS, and substituting the value of $k$, $l$, and $m$, in the LHS we get $\frac{(ps )^3}{p ^3} + \frac{(qs )^3}{q ^3} + \frac{(rs )^3}{r ^3}$}$$"}, {"data": ["s", "s"], "text": "$$\text{"Upon further simplification of the previous equation we get $s ^3 + s ^3 + s ^3 = 3 s ^3$}"}, {"data": ["s", "s"], "text": "$$\text{Upon taking RHS, and substituting the value of $k$, $l$, and $m$, in the RHS we get $\frac{3(ps)(qs)(rs)}{pqr}=3s^2$}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": " "}]
